tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Would like to call her an angel. She welcomed me with a bright smile on all my consultations. Since it was my first pregnancy, I was anxious on variety physical changes which our body goes through when we are pregnant,she helped me understand those are normal and doesn't require any medication, have heard from some of my friends their gynaecologists used to give medication for every silly issues which is not actually required. Also whenever I had any serious concern regarding my baby, she have suggested tests to be sure everything is going right. She recommends doing flexibility and strengthening excersices throughout your pregnancy if you're not having any complications so that you are prepared for a normal delivery physically. She well explained me about labour pain and delivery after my 36 weeks which helped in avoiding confusions and looking for the right symptoms to get admitted for delivery. I could have a normal delivery without any complications with her help. She is extremely positive and you can rely your pregnancy and delivery on her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We visited Dr. Garima Jain for my sister first trimester after checking her feedback in internet with lot of doubts we had and worries. She has been very friendly, address all the queries, gives enough time to the patient and very approachable. My sister has O-ve  blood group and other doctors expressed some complications in her case and later visited to Dr. Garima . She is so nice and the one who built positivity, motivated. My sister delivered baby couple of days ago and it was normal. I would recommend for the upcoming expectant mother’s to definitely visit. Dr. Garima filled happiness in our family.

I generally doesn’t write any reviews or feedback and this is the first review I have ever logged with lot of satisfaction and good vibes

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited Dr. Garima Jain for my second delivery . Even in my forties Dr. Garima helped me to deliver through normal delivery. 

Dr. Garima has always been very friendly . In all my  visits she gave me enough time, listened to my queries and clarified all my doubts very patiently . Under her care and guidance the nine months of pregnancy became a very smooth journey for me.  

I will highly recommend Dr. Garima to anyone planning for a baby or for any gynaecological issues. Under her care one can rest assured that she is in safe hands. 

Thanks a lot Dr. Garima

tags: None
review: She was amazing in 2014. Recommended many of my friends considering how positive she was.  but now will never do it now. I visited her for gynec and she was very straightforward and rude and impatient. May be my assumption was wrong.  Her anger will only cause danger ** ********* I have seen many doctors who never lost cool with patients, no matter what.

tags: None
review: Busy gynaec so wating time is more especially on saturday.. the waiting time is really bad some days.. difficult for working people as its hard to get slot in saturdays.. Doctor was generally ok..i had got positive reviews about her and had consulted her a few times hence continued..  but when I had slight irregularity  in my test reports..inspite of making note of it in my file,  in spite of me putting across my concerns again and again she did not prescribe any medicine or even tell about the consequence..she said I'm being over anxious and all.. issue persisted..  only after consulting another specialist I got little relief... she is friendly and approachable but she should not assume all patients are over reacting.. sometimes they may have a genuine issue that requires medications and little medical investigations and counselling..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had my normal vaginal delivery in Apollo cradle Brookfield hospital under supervision of Dr Garima Jain.. from my beginning of pregnancy until the day of delivery, she motivated me and gave me confidence that I am in safe hands. she is very friendly, open, me and my husband were very comfortable talking to her. she is very practical, and explains complications in a firm way.. i had gestational diabetes complication..me and my husband just followed her instructions in the entire pregnancy and we sailed through it.. she didn't prescribed me unnecessary medicines, she gave me option to control my diabetes through a strict diet and yoga routine.I highly recommend her!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We consulted Dr. Garima for both our pregnancies. Right from day1 she has been very practical without any exaggeration. “Enjoy each day of pregnancy without complicated thoughts” has been the motto always. She never treated pregnancy as a disease. The first delivery was planned in my native and ended up in a c session. 
For the second pregnancy I was determined to have a normal delivery. When I introduced this to doctor Garima, she patiently listened and ask me to learn more about VBAC. She gave us a clear picture of the risks and was very pragmatic with her approach towards VBAC. 
Finally on the day of delivery her support helped us attain what we were dreaming for the last 9 months. Without her guidance my VBAC experience would never be so positive. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
High risk pregnancy with Diabetes and gestational  BP.
She took very good care of my case and help delivering my baby sucessfully . ** **********  **** *** ********** **** **** ********* *** ***** **** **** *******
She is very calm and is capable to provide right direction to her patients.She answers to all your questions even any silly question you ask with patience.

tags: None
review: We shifted to Bangalore during my pregnancy and we met doctor Garima while I was in 6th month of my pregnancy. She is warm and gentle and always welcomes you with a smile. She takes utmost care in ensuring that you are relaxed and not anxious throughout your pregnancy. I can say that she has been more than a doctor to me *** **** *** ** ****** *** **** * She encourages you for a normal delivery, which I had, and she is so positive in her approach that you forget all your worries, she always has had a soothing and calming affect on not just me, but on my entire family. Would definitely recommend her .

tags: None
review: Dr Garima Jain is well experienced and she explained and gave advice with full clarity which helped us understand the exact problem. Also I will go for her advice next time in future as well.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: She is a very good Dr. She treats pregnancy as a normal way of life and does not prescribe un necessary medicines and test. Both my babies passed meconium during labour still she managed to do a normal delivery for both . Tries her best to do normal delivery for expecting mothers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Consulted Doctor Garima Jain for pregnancy.She is an excellent Doctor who always  welcomes us with her positive smile. Have not faced a single issue during my pregnancy and I had a vaginal birth under her supervision . Though I insisted for a c section, doctor and her team encouraged me for normal delivery. We are thankful to doctor and her team for all the support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We consulted Dr. Garima for my wife's pregnancy. She is very experienced doctor and friendly. Her treatment and advise on what precautions to follow, diet, physical activity really helped my wife to deliver a healthy baby even there are some issues. Great Doctor and we are really blessed.

Note: Apollo cradle hospital Brookfield, management staff is not supportive. We faced issues with insurance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My entire pregnancy turned out to be a very pleasant experience and I would definitely like to give the credits to Dr Garima. She was very supportive through out the 9 months and had always encouraged for normal delivery.She will give you the best of advice to be normal and act normal during this time and continue doing all  day today works and remain active which actually helps a lot during normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Garima is a very friendly person and alleviates all anxiety that an expecting mother has. She has been guiding from the beginning to aim for normal delivery and kept following up to make that happen. She also helped answer a lot of queries that keeps coming up before and after the delivery and her treatment and guidance post delivery is also very effective.

Mine was a high risk pregnancy with a possibility of premature delivery from the 6th month. She advised us to leave no stone unturned, performed a pre-emptive cerclage, followed up for an effective recovery answering all the questions on the symptoms that keep propping up.  She kept pushing to carry on and I went full term which I can attribute only to doctor's friendly assurance and expertise.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,
review: I'm happy with doctors treatment of Dr garima Jain but I'm not happy with staffs especially the front office girl Moulin she is very unprofessional and she's not ready to help the patient and just neglecting the patient and she didn't attend me after waiting for the long time for billing and we don't know why management is encouraging this kind of staffs *** ************ ********* ** ***** **** ******* ****** I will not encourage this kind of things and never refer to any one of them to apollo cradle and ground floor sister's are not responsible for profession management please look into this and improve the quality of staff provide a proper service... thank you

review:
*** *** ** **** ********* ******* ***** ******* ** ****** ***** *** **** ********* ******* ************ **** ** *** **** ******** ******* ** **** ***** ** *** ** **** *******  **** **** * ****** ****** ** **** ***** *** *********** *** **** ***** ***** Not even intrested in listening to what you are feeling , you keep on saying am feeling this or that she will fleuently ignore your issue ,just like that and write down a test ,or will just advice you to go for some other doctor. You will feel like your money is wasted and you got zero satisfaction in return .AND every visit is chargeable, so if you forget to ask something once and thought of coming back with test report ,you have to pay the charges again to just show what the doctor adviced to have the test for .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was friendly and patiently listened to my problems. She guided me well  and I m contented with her line of treatment. Overall I liked meeting her and believe that I will be cured without undergoing any procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Garima is my gyneac from 5+years
She know what women are.. Especially working women...keeps to the point... Never encourages fr freq visits or scans... Minimum procedure maximum benefit.. Both physical health n mental health she takes care off

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited dr Garima mam during my 2nd pregnancy ,, my first pregnancy was vaginal delivery so I was expecting for the same this time also but one of my gynae told me that it’s not possible for normal delivery this time coz of my third perineal cut in first delivery so I visited to Garima mam she told me that she will try for normal delivery only ,, n finally she did it , she did it very smoothly very calmly n confidently .. I am very grateful to her , thank you mam,,

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
As a patient more then a friendly doctor I am looking for some one with whom I can share the issues and they have the knowledge to guide and explain the issue in detail.
She explains very well  and is professional . It’s been 11 yrs I visit her off an on for my gynaecology related issues and she has always guided me well. I will always recommend her .
